tuv.seg: Childcare during vocational training
Cúram Leanaí le linn cúrsaí gairmoiliúna
If you have applied for a vocational training course, you may need childcare
Má rud é go bhfuil iarratas déanta agat ar chúrsa gairmoiliúna, féadfar go mbeidh cúram leanaí ag teastáil uait
Under the Childcare Employment and Training Support (CETS) scheme, you may qualify for a subsidised childcare place for your child
Faoin Scéim Tacaíochta um Oiliúint agus um Fhostaíocht Cúram Leanaí (CETS), féadfaidh tú cáiliú le haghaidh áit chúram leanaí in aisce do do leanbh
CETS can provide full-time, part-time or after-school childcare places
Is féidir leis an scéim CETS áiteanna cúram leanaí lánaimseartha, páirtaimseartha nó iarscoile in aisce a chur ar fáil
The CETS scheme is managed by the Department of Children and Youth Affairs (DCYA) via the City and County Childcare Committees
Is í an Roinn Leanaí agus Gnóthaí Óige (DYCA) a bhainistíonn an scéim CETS trí na Coistí Contae agus Cathrach i gCúram Leanaí
It was announced in Budget 2016, that a new single affordable childcare programme will be developed to replace a number of childcare programmes including CETS
Fógraíodh i mBuiséad 2016 go bhforbrófar clár nua aonair cúram leanaí inacmhainne chun teacht in ionad roinnt cláir chúraim leanaí, CETS ina measc
The target date for the new programme is 2017
Is é an spriocdháta don chlár nua 2017
Courses that qualify for CETS
Athruithe ar FÁS agus SOLAS
Not all Education and Training Board courses qualify for CETS
Tá FÁS díscaoilte agus aistríodh roinnt dá fheidhmeanna chuig SOLAS
The courses that qualify for CETS include Youthreach, Vocational Training Opportunities Scheme (VTOS), the Back to Education Initiative (BTEI), Further Education and Training (FET) courses (i.e
Ón 1 Eanáir 2014, aistreofar rannóg oiliúna FÁS ar bhonn céimnithe chuig na 16 Bhord Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO) a tháinig isteach in ionad Coistí Gairmoideachais
specific skills training and traineeships), the FIT Initiative and Momentum
Más rud é go bhfuil tú i mbun cúrsa de chuid SOLAS faoi láthair, ní rachaidh na hathruithe sin i bhfeidhm ort
Courses that do not qualify for CETS
Cúrsaí a cháilíonn le haghaidh CETS
You will not qualify for CETS if you are on one of the following: Job Initiative, SOLAS apprenticeship, an evening course, supported employment, Job Club or the Work Placement programme

Ní cháilíonn na cúrsaí gairmoiliúna go léir de chuid SOLAS nó na mBord Oideachais agus Oiliúna le haghaidh CETS ach áirítear na cúrsaí seo a leanas leis na cúrsaí a cháilíonn: Ógtheagmháil, Scéim Deiseanna Oiliúna Gairmoideachais (SDOG), an Tionscnamh um Fhilleadh ar an Oideachas (BTEI), oiliúint agus cúrsaí oiliúna scileanna sonracha de chuid SOLAS, Tionscnamh FIT, Momentum agus Fostaíocht Pobail
FÁS was dissolved and some of its functions were transferred to SOLAS
Cúrsaí nach gcáilíonn le haghaidh CETS

On 1 January 2014, the FÁS training division began its transfer to the 16 Education and Training Boards (ETBs) which replaced VECs. All training courses will have transferred on 1 July 2014. If you are currently on a training course, you will not be affected by these changes

Ní cháileoidh tú le haghaidh CETS más rud é go bhfuil tú i mbun ceann amháin de na nithe seo a leanas: Tionscnamh Jabanna, printíseacht SOLAS, cúrsa oíche, fostaíocht faoi thacaíocht, Club Jabanna nó an clár um Shocrúchán Oibre
The number of places available under CETS is limited
Tá teorainn leis an líon áiteanna atá ar fáil faoi CETS
Places are allocated on a first-come first-served basis
Leithdháiltear áiteanna ar bhonn tús freastail ar an gceann is túisce
You may qualify for a childcare place while on a vocational training course if:
Féadfaidh tú cáiliú le haghaidh áit chúram leanaí in aisce agus tú i mbun cúrsa gairmoiliúna más rud é:
• You are currently unemployed and wish to undertake an ETB vocational training course or participate in Momentum or Community Employment
• Go bhfuil tú dífhostaithe faoi láthair agus gur mian leat tabhairt faoi chúrsa gairmoiliúna de chuid SOLAS nó ETB nó páirt a ghlacadh i gclár Momentum nó Fostaíocht Pobail
Not all ETB courses qualify for CETS
Ní cháilíonn gach cúrsa de chuid SOLAS nó ETB le haghaidh CETS
• You are the main carer of a child or children
• Gur tusa an príomhchúramóir linbh nó leanaí
• You need assistance with child care in order to take up a training opportunity
• Go dteastaíonn cabhair uait le cúram leanaí chun glacadh le deis oiliúna
If you cannot find a place for your child you should contact your local City or County Childcare Committee and let them know the area in which you need a childcare place

Mura féidir leat áit a fháil do do leanbh ba cheart duit dul i dteagmháil leis an gCoiste Contae agus Cathrach i gCúram Leanaí atá áitiúil duit agus cur in iúl dóibh cé acu ceantar ina dteastaíonn áit chúram leanaí uait
They will ask the DCYA, who will try to provide additional childcare places in your area
Cuirfidh sé ceist ar an Roinn Leanaí agus Gnóthaí Óige, a dhéanfaidh iarracht áiteanna breise cúram leanaí a chur ar fáil i do cheantar
The maximum amount per child that childcare providers may charge to parents per week is:
Is é an t-uasmhéid a fhéadfaidh soláthraithe cúram leanaí a ghearradh ar thuismitheoirí sa tseachtain ná:
• Full-time: €25 per week
• Lánaimseartha: €25 sa tseachtain
• Part time: €15 per week
• Páirtaimseartha: €15 sa tseachtain
• Afterschool: €5 per week
• Tar éis na scoile: €5 sa tseachtain
• Afterschool with pickup service: €15
• Tar éis na scoile mar aon le seirbhís bhailiúcháin: €15
Services may not charge for weeks where the service is not open
Ní fhéadfaidh seirbhísí táille a ghearradh le haghaidh seachtainí nach bhfuil an tseirbhís ar oscailt
You should let the course provider know that you have child care needs and want to be considered for CETS
Ba cheart duit cur in iúl do sholáthraí an chúrsa go bhfuil riachtanais chúram leanaí agat agus gur mian leat go ndéanfar breithniú ort le haghaidh CETS
When you get your letter offering you a place on a course, you will also be given a list of local childcare providers
Nuair a fhaigheann tú litir lena dtairgtear áit ar chúrsa duit, tabharfar liosta de sholáthraithe áitiúla cúram leanaí duit freisin
You should use this letter to book a place for your child or children with a childcare provider
Ba cheart duit an litir sin a úsáid chun áit a chur in áirithe do do leanbh nó do leanaí le soláthraí cúram leanaí
When your training starts you will get a letter confirming that you have started the course and giving the start and finish dates
Ba cheart duit an litir sin a thaispeáint don soláthraí cúram leanaí chun fad d’áite cúram leanaí a dheimhniú
You should show this letter to the childcare provider to confirm the duration of your childcare place
Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas Déan teagmháil le soláthraí do chúrsa maidir le do riachtanais chúram leanaí
